name: カウボーイビバップ (1)
summary: The hippest bounty hunters in the galaxy are back! Spike Spiegel, Jet Black and Faye Valentine are on the hunt for new targets. Inspired by the hit anime series, Cowboy Bebop blends science fiction, spaghetti westerns, film noir, and jazz music into a new genre that’s all about style. As each volume features four stand-alone adventures, this is the perfect time to find out what all the excitement is about.
